title: Goal!
description: Kieran Trippiers corner flies over everyone and Ben Mee is unmarked at the back post to head the ball in!

title: Goal!
description: Scott Arfield won the ball off Joel Ward near the touchline and cut the ball back to Ings in the box. The striker scored with a neat first-time finish to double Burnleys lead

title: Yellow card
description: Scott Dann shown a yellow card for a foul on Ashley Barnes

title: Goal!
description: Some neat play from Wilfried Zaha as he gets forward and his cross is deflected into the path of Gayle who scores with a powerfully-hit strike

title: Goal!
description: Puncheon was allowed to bring the ball forward from near the halfway line. He got near the edge of the box and hit a curling effort that found the bottom corner past the despairing dive of Thomas Heaton

title: Yellow card
description: Jason Shackell shown a yellow card by Phil Dowd for something he said to the referee

title: Substitution
description: Palace make their first change as Wilfried Zaha is replaced by Adlène Guédioura

title: Substitution
description: Burnley make a change as Ashley Barnes is replaced by Sam Vokes

title: Yellow card
description: Yaya Sanogo shown a yellow card for a foul on Kieran Trippier

title: Yellow card
description: Joel Ward shown a yellow card for a foul on George Boyd

title: Substitution
description: Palace make a change as Yaya Sanogo is replaced by Glenn Murray

title: Substitution
description: Palace make a change as Martin Kelly is replaced by Adrian Mariappa

title: Goal!
description: A cross field pass from Jason Puncheon finds Dwight Gayle in the box and he hits a low angled drive that rifles into the bottom corner of the net
